title: Topic 001 Question 011
body: You support the backend of a mobile phone game that runs on a Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster. The application is serving HTTP requests from users.
You need to implement a solution that will reduce the network cost. What should you do?
options: Configure the VPC as a Shared VPC Host project.
Configure your network services on the Standard Tier.
Configure your Kubernetes cluster as a Private Cluster.
Configure a Google Cloud HTTP Load Balancer as Ingress.
